name: B. Maximum Sum
statement:
You are given an array a_1, a_2,
dots, a_n, where all elements are different.You have to perform k
operations with it. During each operation, you do of the following two
actions (you choose which to do yourself): find in the array, and delete
them; find in the array, and delete it. You have to calculate the
maximum possible sum of elements in the resulting array.
